Aperture Desk Job reimagines the been-there-done-that genre of walking simulators and puts them in the lightning-spanked, endorphin-gorged world of sitting still behind things.

You play as an entry-level nobody on their first day at work — your heart full of hope and your legs full of dreams, eager to climb that corporate ladder. But life’s got other plans, and they all involve chairs.

Designed as a free playable short for Valve’s new Steam Deck, Desk Job walks you through the handheld’s controls and features, while not being nearly as boring as that sounds.

Lower your expectations: This is not a sequel to Portal. Now get ready to raise them slightly, because it is in the expanded universe of those games. Desk Job puts you squarely in the driver’s seat at Aperture Science. Then quickly removes the driving part and adds a desk in front of the seat.

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Collector's Edition
summary: The Collector's Edition of A Plague Tale: Requiem includes the game, an incredible statue of Amicia and Hugo, and several collector items!

name: Apocalyptic Slant
summary: You are the chosen one to save the world once and for all. Explore the world in this classic FPS shooter game full of bloody zombies, poisonous spiders, and strange-looking creatures. Hopeful citizens are willing to give you everything they have in order to help them survive the apocalypse.

name: Apsis
summary: Survive as long as possible in this hardcore Arcade Throwback. Avoid Asteroids and the Planets while collecting as many water filled Comets as possible!

name: A Pirate's Pleasure: Bonus Stories
summary: Three all-new stories of pirate adventure!

name: Apocalyptic Adventure: Episode 1
summary: A unique twist on survival by combining action, adventure, and strategy in virtual reality. Apocalyptic Adventure is a game where players must manage resources, plan defenses, and explore to survive.

name: Apocalypse: Floodgates
summary: Heard 'em up, Mow 'em Down! Mindless Carnage, fast-paced action. Apocalypse: Floodgates is a Third-Person Zombie Horde Shooter featuring post-apocalyptic weapons and deadly traps. Play online with up to four friends or play alone and see how many zombie waves you can take down.

name: Apré Lapli
summary: A chill narative adventure starring Maya and her Granpa. Defy the difficulties of the scarce environment to discover Maya's origins as they approach their destination.

name: A Potion For Chamomile
summary: One day, Chamomile shows up to Lavender's house with a special potion recipe. She wants a transformation potion! Sadly she only has the recipe for a temporary one, so the two witches set out on a wild adventure to gather the ingredients for a permanent transformation potion!

name: Apollo: A Co-Op Game
summary: One astronaut. Up to four mission commanders. Work together to plan your mission and experience the historic highlights of the Apollo space program.

name: Apex Legends: Saviors
summary: Let No One Fall

name: April Was A Fool
summary:
Two years ago, six heroes triumphed over the evil Overlord. Which is great! Except that a new evil force has risen and wants to conquer the world once again: Evil. The king of the land decided to summoned the six heroes to fight it…

…But their leader, April, is dead and with her the spirit of the Team. No one has the heart to tell him what happen to her but at the same time has to see him before going on their journey. That where May (the MC) comes in: thanks to her uncanny ressemblance with April, they deceived the king and can go on adventure to defeat Evil!

Of course, the story doesn’t stop here, as May Jumped at the Call to accompany the World Class Heroes… And maybe, have a smooch with one of them. Maybe. Mainly because everybody is an idiot and things can get really dark at times.

name: Apocalyptic Dream
summary: Apocalyptic Dream, or ApoYume for short, is a dual-protagonist otome visual novel set during a zombie outbreak. You play as twins Toshiro and Mikuru Aikyo, intermittently swapping POV.

name: Apocalive
summary: Fight for your life against zombies, dinosaurs and other post-apocalyptic creatures. The game includes several maps and different game modes. Some are Fast-paced, while other are slow.

name: A Piano Tale
summary: A Piano Tale immerses the player in the life of musician Alexandra Aaronovitch and her father Boris. Can you help Alexandra find the fragments of the secret concerto for piano and orchestra written by Boris, and play it? Travel to the cultural capitals of Vienna and St. Petersburg.

name: Apple Shooter
summary: Apple Shooter is an archery game that will test your skills as an Indian warrior. Being a sharp-shooter is what this game needs since the life of your friend depends on how well you target the apple. Every time you hit the apple, the distance between you and your friend will be farther. Also, there will be some sort of a barricade to make the difficulty more advanced. Your friend's life is at risk. There's no room for mistakes so be brave and be sharp enough to target the apple and try not to kill your dear friend. Take your time in controlling the power and direction of the bow to perfect the shot and save your friend.

name: Apparitions
summary: Apparitions is a 4 player co-op ghost hunting game. Figure out how to communicate with the other side. Use the equipment to find out what type of ghost you and you're team are dealing with and determine how to exorcise it accordingly or help it pass on peacefully.

name: Ape Escape
summary:
Experience Ape Escape originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Hunt down hundreds of cheeky chimps in the original Ape Escape adventure and collect loads of cool gadgets and tools, including a slingshot, monkey-net, sky-flying propeller, radio-controlled car, and monkey radar. Enjoy over 20 levels of madcap mayhem plus bonus mini-games including ski racing and Monkey Boxing.

name: Apocripha/0 Alex Disk
summary: Apocripha/0 Alex Disk is a visual novel for PC.

name: Apocripha/0 Platina Disk
summary: Apocripha/0 Platina Disk is a PC game by Stack Software.

name: Apocripha/0 Fanbox Happiness Cage
summary: Apocripha/0 FANBOX Happiness Cage is an visual novel, developed and published by Stack, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Apocripha/0
summary: Apocripha/0 is a bundle of both Apocripha/0 Alex Disk and Apocripha/0 Platina Disk for PlayStation 2.

name: A Plumber for All Seasons
summary: A mod for Super Mario World where each world represents a different season—Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter, and more—featuring mostly hand-drawn, custom graphics. Play through 37 levels (41 exits) of season-themed scenery, enjoy an original soundtrack, and discover rewards and easter eggs for completionists.

name: Apparatus
summary: Lost, trapped, and alone within the Delta Labs. You must find your way out with your life, any slight mess-up could be your life in this 2D story platformer

name: Apocalyptic
summary: Apocalyptic is a Zombie Survival Shooter Video Game. It begins in a church where zombies flood everywhere. There are survival quests as you proceed through the campaigns and you must try and survive the apocalyptic horde.

name: A Paradox Between Worlds
summary: It is the year 201X, and the Nebulaverse fandom is on fire. You are a teen online, and your safe place is about to be torn apart.

name: Apartment No. 9
summary: Help Leah find happiness or lead her to ruin in this dark slice-of-life story about a teacher whose life is turned upside down when the homeless guy she often stares at out of her window shows up at her door, claiming to have found her purse.

name: Apartment No. 9: BxG Version
summary: Help Rue find happiness or lead him to ruin in this dark slice-of-life story about a teacher whose life is turned upside down when the homeless girl he often stares at out of his window shows up at his door, claiming to have found his wallet.

name: Apartment Story: A Moving Simulator
summary: A story about a stressful move.

name: Apathy: Narugami Gakuen Nana Fushigi
summary: A first-year student Shuichi Sakagami a member of the school newspaper club is asked to gather information from the seven storytellers assembled by his seniors to feature about the school's seven mysteries.

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Cloud Version
summary: A Plague Tale: Requiem is an action-adventure game similar to its predecessor. The player assumes control of Amicia and must face against both soldiers from the French Inquisition and hordes of rats that are spreading the black plague. Gameplay is largely similar to the first game, though the combat system is significantly expanded. The game features a progression system in which the player will be awarded additional skills and abilities. Stealth players will unlock skills that allow them to sneak around more efficiently, while those who prefer a more lethal approach will unlock additional combat skills. Locations are also larger, giving players additional options to progress.

name: A Pact With Me
summary: Three humans summon Belial, a mischievous demon, to form a pact with. In exchange for granting their wishes, he would take their souls after 20 years. While assisting them, will Belial grow fond of these humans or corrupt them instead?

name: Apex Legends: Hunted
summary: Vantage’s mother may have raised her to survive the wilds of Págos, but she never crossed paths with a Legend. With her squadmates' help, she’ll need to discover the will to survive.

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Visual Novel Version
summary:
Sakagami Shuuichi, a member of the school newspaper, is asked to gather information about the school's seven mysteries. He meets with six other students after school to listen to their stories.

This game is a visual novel adaption of the two novels "Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi" written by Iijima Takeo. It features the novels' content with no branches, and an additional scenario called "Emi-chan no Sakagami-kun Kansatsu Nikki" (Emi-chan's Sakagami Observation Diary).

name: Apathy: Midnight Collection - Vol. 2
summary:
Apathy - Midnight Collection ~Vol. 2~ is comprised of two parts:
The Kikoku no Shou edition of Apathy - Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi ~Visual Novel Version~ and a sequel to Apathy ~Narugami Gakuen Toshi Densetsu Tanteikyoku~.

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Shinsei
summary:
Coming from 3 writers from the 'Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi 1995' series and 4 from the 'Shou Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi' series.

This work is a short novel that can be enjoyed by those who are new to the Gakkowa series.

name: Apathy: Shougakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Getsuyoubi
summary:
Welcome to Narugami Elementary School.
The Gakkou de atta Kowai Hanashi novels have finally become a visual novel!

New storytellers will appear in addition to some nostalgic characters.

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi 2008 - Vol.1
summary:
What is the truth hidden in the school?

Private Narukami School. This academy has a strange school rule that prohibits talking about the seven wonders of the school.
However, the newspaper club suddenly organizes a meeting of the seven wonders.

name: Apollo's Adventure
summary: Step into the shoes of Apollo and try to find the Sage of Wisdom as you explore many levels and face multiple puzzles.

name: Apex Legends Mobile: Prime Time
summary: World Wide Launch is upon us and we could not be more excited to share Apex Legends Mobile with the world. So strap in for a brand new adventure as we introduce a new Legend to the Apex Games: Fade.

name: Apex Legends Mobile: Cold Snap
summary: Brace yourself, Legends: a Cold Snap is coming to Apex Legends Mobile! Welcome Loba to the Legends and see how the Games are evolving in Apex Legends Mobile: Cold Snap.

name: Apex Legends Mobile: Distortion
summary: Greetings Legends and welcome to a brand new Apex Legends Mobile season: Distortion. We’ve got a lot to cover, including a new legend, game modes and much more so let's jump into it!

name: A Path to Light
summary: An original handcrafted puzzle. Guide your steps and find the way. Sometimes the path can be hard. The goal is to touch the triangle(light).

name: Apotheosis
summary: Apotheosis is a single player turn based RPG that takes place in a surreal universe. Discover the powers of the Archetypes that lie within and use them to your advantage. Solve puzzles, explore mazes and unveil the truth about your past.

name: App Co Tycoon
summary: App Co Tycoon is Bussiness Managament Game

name: Apathy: Rental Kazoku
summary:
A man who seeks a family.
A girl who remembers father only in her memories.
A young man who is entangled in lies.
A child who has no place to return to.
This is a story where these people meet and find happiness in each other. And thus a small miracle is born.

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Shinsei 2
Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Himitsu
summary:
Project celebrating the 25th anniversary of Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi.
The choices were chosen based on Twitter's polls and a contest was held to find new branching scenarios.

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Kiwame
summary:
This is a "schoolhouse horror story" that happened in another world.

High school students have gathered from all over the country to tell scary stories that happened at school. However, the gathering is led in an unexpected direction.

The largest text adventure horror in the Apathy series with over 400 branches with 147 endings.

name: Apathy: Napoli no Otoko-tachi in Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi
A Pig's Dreams
summary:
Ed was a happy pig and He lived with his family at the farm, when he was suddenly kidnapped and brought to a malign research lab to be used as a lab animal. He stayed there for a long time...
But his fortune changed in a rainy night, when He escaped and recovered his dreamed freedom.

name: Approval
summary: A new sensation! Real-time roguelike! Approval tower "Aprival" that everyone dreams of breaking through The Monono monory is Using the tower of approval that suddenly appeared in the village Develop a village!

name: A Pointless Adventure
summary: A Throw back to classic Atari adventure games, but with a completely ridiculous story.

name: Apples and Asteroids
summary: Collect apples. Avoid asteroids. It's as simple as that...or is it? Join Q-Boy in this 2D platform as he seeks victory!

name: A Peculiar Adventure on Bast
summary: Join two colorful heroes from opposite sides of the continent as they stumble into the adventure of their lives. Crazy gadgets, charismatic characters, a hint of the uncanny - you'll find it all in the beautifully hand-drawn steampunk world of Bast!

name: Apollo Red Moon
summary: Apollo Red Moon - is a retro sci fi fast paced shooter. That takes action in alternative history. As a member of Apollo Mission, after successful landing on the moon, you were amubushed and taken prisoner by Soviets who builds military base on the moon.

name: Apex Point
summary: Apex Point has been in development since 2018 by a group of friends that aim to create a car enthusiast's dream game. It is an open world game that aims to immerge you into the Japanese car culture by providing a huge variety of customizations and race types so you can choose your own path

name: A Portrait of Feathers
summary: A Portrait of Feathers is a bite-sized visual novel about an angel and someone they've watched over.

name: A Pequena Grande Crise 2: A Ameaça é Outra Agora
summary: A Pequena Grande Crise 2: A Ameaça é Outra Agora is the second entry of the financial simulation game where you become the president of the European Union to handle its debt crisis.

name: A Pequena Grande Crise 3: A Queda do Gigante
summary: A Pequena Grande Crise 3: A Queda do Gigante is the third entry of the financial simulation game where you need to go back to 2011 to avoid the Brazilian economic crisis.

name: ApocZ
summary: ApocZ is open world survival on the northern Black Sea. Set in a post apocalyptic environment you will have to navigate walking dead zombies and other survivors. Team up with other survivors or live as a loner, but know that when you die its final.

name: Appleocalypse
summary: Find all the apples, gain their powers, and discover your purpose in this small world you live in! Fly! Climb! Control toys! Rob a bank? You decide in this 2D platformer and find all the different apple abilities!

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Protector Pack
summary:
The Protector Pack gives the player bonus crafting materials, extra cosmetics for Amicia, and an exclusive crossbow skin.

This pack contains :
-The exclusive Red Damsel crossbow skin. Unlocked in the game when the crossbow is found.
-The 13 flowers Amicia could find in A Plague Tale: Innocence to wear in her hair. Unlocked at the beginning of the adventure.
-A pack of metal scraps and a tool to improve your gear early on. Unlocked in the game when accessing a workbench for the first time.

name: Apex Legends: Eclipse
summary: The new map Broken Moon has a fierce defender: meet Catalyst and see the brutal beauty of Cleo in Apex Legends:

name: Apollo: A Dream Odyssey
summary: Apollo: A Dream Odyssey is an emotional journey about a young girl's search of meaning, self-reflection, and lost dreams.

name: Apache 3D Sim Flight Simulator
summary:
Enjoy a fully featured combat flight simulator and join over 1.500.000 players.
Apache 3D Sim brings in the game such incredible detailed processing of a combat helicopter with a unique physics and weapon system that has not been here yet.

name: Ape vs. Caveman
summary:
Total retro arcade action!
Introducing... Caveman! Caveman looking for Stonehenge. Caveman like Stonehenge. But caveman no like evil monkey, sticky cactus, bad bird, pointy rhino or falling rocks! These things bad. Help Caveman reach Stonehenge and advance to the next level.
A classic favorite, in new glorious 3D! Caveman must jump over falling rocks that are hurled down on him by a giant ape. Luckily, there are other jungle animals willing to help!
This incredible new action-packed game has awesome music and graphics with a classic retro feel.

name: A Path to the Princess
summary: Find best way to fulfil your dream.. That's obviously getting the girl - or should I say "saving the princess"? Between you and your dreams, there is only simple puzzles! Beware the holes, be fast, get her!

name: ApoZomb
summary: Unknown virus turning people into "zombies" is spreading among the earth. You are one of the survivors its up to you if you want to stay alive or became one of those monsters . Fight for supplies defend your territories and survive

name: Apple Pie
summary: A sweet, cute friendship/dating sim with roleplaying elements.

name: Apt. Map
summary: Wondrous floating eye game.

name: Apotris
summary: A homebrew Tetris-like block stacking game for GameBoy Advance. Apotris features 11 game modes and the ability to edit the appearance of pieces in-game.

name: Apple
summary: Apple is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame made. It stars Píng Guǒ Zǐ, a girl who wears an apple costume. She cannot leave her room, so the only thing she can do is sleep in her bed and dream.

name: A Plague Tale Bundle
summary: A Plague Tale Bundle includes the entirety of Amicia and Hugo’s heartrending journey through history's darkest hours with the two acclaimed games A Plague Tale: Innocence and its sequel A Plague Tale: Requiem.

name: A ponte
summary: Released built-in some Master System consoles from Tec Toy.

name: Apploid: Ballfare
summary: A casual multiplayer sports game that features a combination of rugby and dodgeball elements with a grappling hook mechanic.

name: A Passive Boy at the Huntress Clinic
summary: The protagonist is unable to move due to a car accident and is now being approached by the heroines. And so begins a hospital stay surrounded by prank-loving female doctors and nurses!!

name: Applied Energistics
summary: Applied Energistics is a Minecraft Mod which contains some basic tools, some electric tools and an advanced storage system called ME that lets you store items compactly and in the way you want.

name: Apex Race Manager 2019
summary: Are you up for the Apex Race Manager challenge?

name: Apple Bowl
summary:
Apple Bowl is a 1-player bowling game for the Apple II.

Played from a 1st person perspective at a bowling alley, the player bowls in lane, while occasionally another member at the bowling alley will bowl in lanes. A throw indicator scrolls slowly along the bottom of the screen, and the player starts their bowl when the ball is in their preferred position. The player controls the power and spin of the ball using the game paddles, and the game attempts to accurately simulate the physics of bowling. Follows standard 10-pin bowling rules with a total of 10 frames of bowling.

name: Apart of Me
summary:
Apart of Me is a multi-award-winning therapeutic game. It was co-created by experts in child psychology and bereaved young people, and translates bereavement counseling techniques into a magical 3D world.

You will be transported to a beautiful, peaceful island where you will meet a variety of friendly creatures. You will be given a guide to support you along your journey. Your guide will help you to explore, accept, understand and articulate your experience of grief and the wide range of emotions connected to it. As you progress through the game, you will discover your own strengths and wisdom. The island is a safe place where you can begin to process your grief at a pace that suits you, remember the person you have lost, and hear from others who know what it is like to lose someone you love.

name: Apes vs Helium
summary: Apes vs. Helium is a game that was made in 2020 and is a first person shooter based off of the tower defense game series Bloons TD. In the game you play as the unique monkeys that appear throughout the series, starting off as the Dart Monkey. You begin upgrading your weapons, changing classes, and buying extra support to help you along the way.

name: A Promise Best Left Unkept
summary: Harry finally made a huge breakthrough in his quest for success by scoring a major deal for his company, but what he didn’t foresee is that this would unintentionally invite an undesirable presence into his life. The representative of the subcontracting company—his old bully from high school.

name: Aposfera Spacetrips
summary: Space trips across the your personal universe

name: Apex Legends: Revelry
summary:
To celebrate another anniversary of the Apex Games, Duardo Silva's throwing quite the party. But Mad Maggie never met a Syndicate event she didn't want to crash.
R.S.V.P. to the wildest party in Outlands history. It’s time to drop in and get legendary in Apex Legends: Revelry! New Team Deathmatch mode joins the Apex Games, and remastered Legend classes means everyone has a role to play. And with the new Nemesis rifle joining the Loadout, the big guns have officially arrived. The party don't start till you drop in!

name: Apex Legends Mobile: Champions
summary:
While the memory of a battle fades, the strength of a Legend only grows. Tell a lasting tale when you enter the ring in Apex Legends Mobile: Champions.
Greetings Legends and welcome to Season 3 of Apex Legends Mobile! Strap in and prepare yourselves for battle with Apex Mobile’s largest update to date. In this update, we have a new Legend joining the Apex Games, new events, changes to core systems, balancing for Legends and weapons alike and much more. Players who update to the latest patch early will receive seasonal currency and extra syndicate packs!

name: Aphotic
summary: A retro textless Point'n Click.

name: Apocalypse Factory
summary: Apocalypse Factory is an automation game with tower defense mechanics. You get production orders to fulfill while defending your production lines against zombies and gangs.

name: Apple Sauce Room
summary: Short point-and-click game, including animations and quiz minigames.

name: Apoth
summary: Apoth is a real-time dungeon crawler with rogue-lite elements. Venture to the town of Apoth where many exciting adventures await. Delve through randomly generated dungeons, sewers, caves, crypts and temples.

name: A Passive Boy at the Huntress Clinic
Apes.io
summary: Apes.io is a multiplayer game where you drop into an endless battle royale armed with terrible ape magic in Apes.io. Collect ancient artifacts and craft one-of-a-kind magical weapons. Discover spells, forge wands, and grow to become the biggest ape on the island!

name: Apostate
summary: Battle against the horrors of a rogue wizard cult after being labeled an Apostate. In this top down, action roguelite, choose from a vast selection of spells, augmentations, items, and stats to create your own unique custom hero. Discover synergies and unlock builds as you compete against your foes.

name: Apewar
summary: Apewar is an online tactical and action FPS/TPS monkey war game adapted from real life. Build your monkey team and fight against your enemies. By playing in a coordinated way, you can have fun and win with a good strategy. Monkeys are strong together!

name: Ape Academy 2
summary:
Experience Ape Academy 2 originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The apes have finally graduated from the Ape Academy, so this term things are going to be a little different! Evil genius Specter has invented a new card game and it’s sweeping the globe, helping him on his way towards world domination.

Get ready to mix it up with the monkeys using Specter’s ‘scissors, paper, rock’ cards – there are 300 to collect – before taking them on in over 100 fiendishly difficult mini-games. Just don’t underestimate the apes, no matter how silly they act; Specter has put an ultra-rare platinum monkey card up for grabs (not to mention a year’s supply of bananas) and they’ll do anything to claim the prize!

name: Appare-den: Fukuryuu no Shou
summary: Appare-den: Fukuryuu no Shou plays like a traditional top-down Japanese RPG, with world map traveling, random enemies, and turn-based combat. The attacks in combat are animated; after the player has assigned command to all the characters, the animation shows the entire party attack at once. There are also special techniques the heroes can learn and execute in battles.

name: Appearances
summary: A Single-player, first-person horror game. Little Suzy finds herself alone in the family villa, but something lurks in the surroundings and seems to have made Suzy his prey… Is it real or just her imagination? Unravel the hidden secrets in order to understand the truth behind your torments.

name: A Phone Found in Tall Grass
summary:
a phone found in tall grass is an experimental visual novel made in one month. There are no choices and should take between ten and twenty minutes to read.

It tells the story of an apocalypse and three aimless 20-something adults stuck in the middle, via tweets. Read the latest news! Shitpost while hurtling towards oblivion! Tell your closest friends how much you love them!

name: Apocalypse Traffic
summary:
The year is 2030. A human pandemic has swept the Earth leaving only a few survivors. The world's cities are now run by nature; barren land resides where communities once thrived. Buckle up, it’s time to fight for survival through the Apocalypse Traffic.
Drive your way through three decimated locations whilst avoiding traffic to increase money; High-octane driving is rewarded with near miss and high-speed bonuses. Witness the new world through three locations - a decaying city, desolate badlands and a town left in ruins.
After dodging traffic, spend your coins on upgrading the car’s brakes, steering and acceleration. Once the money rolls in, upgrade your car from one of the seven available. Each has their own unique style and characteristics.

name: Aphotic Descent
summary: In Aphotic Descent, you play as a diver whose submarine crashed at the bottom of the ocean. With no other option for survival, you must make your way to a nearby underwater research facility facing terrifying creatures, all while descending deeper and deeper...

name: Apex Gun
summary: A scrolling vertical shooter similar to 1942; also called Sky Fighter.

name: Apico 2.0: I Can’t Beelieve it’s Not Butter(flies)!
summary:
The new update is buzzing with an un-bee-lievable amount of new content, including new pollinators, new characters to meet, and more:

New NPCs: New friends from the mainland, Cody and Sto, have come to the APICO Islands to further their research.
Butterflies: Discover, collect and breed a variety of brand-new pollinators.
Solitary Bees: These new pollinators prefer to do things on their own – build new solitary bee hotels and help them along!
New Flowers: Now, there are more ways to keep the pollinator population happy – each new flower has its own new effect on the environment.
Incense: Through the magic of alchemy, make your own incense and candles!
Bee-Sides: New tracks have been added to the chill soundtrack
And More: New books, decorations, and a host of quality-of-life improvements have been added.

name: Aphelion Headhunters
summary: Aphelion Headhunters is a Third-Person PVE Hero Shooter featuring two unique player characters, each with their own distinct playstyle, abilities and suite of selectable upgrades.

name: April's Diary
summary: Help April, a young housekeeper in England during the Victorian era to clean up the many rooms in Lord Ashford's manor. Challenging and fun 3D puzzles with a match-3 element embedded.

name: Apex Legends: Arsenal
summary:
Before the Apex Games, a more brutal competition held sway: the Thunderdome Games! Here, sibling fighters Sok Leng and Kit Siang Phua reigned supreme. They were joined by August Brinkman, Sok Leng’s eventual husband. But when August’s selfish playstyle led to Kit Siang’s death, August would retreat from the Games, from Sok Leng, and from their young son, Nate.

August spent decades as a recluse. When Nate decides to follow his family’s legacy into the arena, August returns to strike a deal to reenter the Games in his son’s place.

name: Apploval
summary: New sensation! Real-time roguelike! Automatically generated random dungeon! The level is reset every time, so you can enjoy it again.

name: Apple Knight 2
summary:
Become the Ultimate Hero!

Dive into intense hack-and-slash action as you battle through hordes of enemies in this action platformer! Explore treacherous dungeons, and unlock a vast arsenal of weapons, skins, abilities, and pets!

name: Apple Quest Monsters DX
summary: Over 100 pages containing 85 lovingly crafted sprites and descriptions of monsters, a map, photos and more; all from a non existant RPG, inspired by my childhood love of reading strategy guides for games I never played.

name: Apartament 1406
summary: Apartment 1406 is a horror game that will give you an amazing experience in a dark horror world. The game introduces psychological elements such as ever-changing environments and two alternate worlds, which makes it very interesting and mysterious. The player must face various unknown phenomena, ghosts and demons, which combined with the dark and gloomy atmosphere will give you great emotions.

name: A Pretty Broken Adventure
summary: A Pretty Broken Adventure is a solo-developed, hand-drawn point-and-click adventure.

name: A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard
summary: A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard is a retro-style action roguelite game with elements of horror. Boost your priest abilities and survive as long as you can in a graveyard full of hostile and never-ending creatures.

name: Apocalypse Run!
summary: Escape from Motorlord Dysentery and reverse the Apocalypse while learning about American history.

name: April '86
summary: April ‘86 - is a mystical first-person thriller which has our protagonist journeying to the abandoned city of Pripyat, to confront the secrets of the past.

name: Apocalypse Blitz
summary: Apocalypse Blitz is a unique 2D Beatem Up set in the not too distant future. Choose from a special team made up of two angels, an angry prophet, a so called super hero and a spiritual world astronaut ready to fight and free our altered homes from evil.

name: A Postcard From Afthonia
summary:
Once upon a time, two seemingly different creatures decided to have a baby. (Such things are possible in the Lands of Dream.) But it was a time of revolution and war, and they were worried about their baby's future, so they asked you to help them seek the wisdom of the Oracle…

A Postcard From Afthonia is a short excursion to the Isle of the Sun via the means of a magical portal. Said portal connects to events that take place after The Sea Will Claim Everything, but can be nevertheless be used by someone who has not taken that journey yet.

name: Apotheosis X
summary:
Apotheosis X pushes the boundaries of what's possible aesthetically with the marathon engine whilst retaining its low resolution 90's charm.

The campaign features engaging combat that scales with player skill and aggression, with a roster of new enemies and weaponry that compliments the original games' nuance and high skill ceiling.

name: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy
summary:
Court is back in session with Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy!
Featuring three games - Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney, Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Dual Destinies, and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Spirit of Justice - join Apollo Justice on his journey to bring order to the courts and bring an end to the dark age of the law!

name: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney
summary: Apollo Justice is the first game in the series that does not feature Phoenix Wright as the main protagonist, though it is not the first time a different attorney has been playable. The game is set in the year 2026, which is seven years after Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trials and Tribulations. Phoenix Wright has been stripped of his attorney's badge, and Apollo Justice, an up-and-coming attorney, becomes his apprentice.

name: Append
summary: Destroy friends or strangers in this online multiplayer bullet heaven/hell shooter. Collect powerups, combine weapons, build your defenses and obliterate the opposition. Hundreds of weapon combinations and multiple game modes.

name: Apricity
summary: Chiara leads a solitary life, barred from stepping out during winter due to the mythical dangers that lurk within. But her curiosity gets the better of her, and she escapes to catch a glimpse of the famous Starflake flowers before they disappear when Spring arrives. That's when she stumbles upon the fabled snow spirit, and a strange bond begins to blossom between them...

name: Apes At Sea
summary: Trapped in a mysterios sea full of monkeys. Try and collect bananas to buy upgrades from shopkeepers in the world. Sink ships and defeat bosses for bananas and powerups.

name: Approaching Cao Army
summary: This is a positional combat game that combines elements of Snake, Grid Avoidance, and Vampire-style combat. Players control the entire team of heroes by controlling the leader. The cute art style, beautiful music, and smooth rhythm combine to offer a pleasant experience.

name: Apeiron
summary: Apeiron is a play-and-earn God Game x eSports hybrid that revives the classic god simulation genre from the early 2000s. Players can 'play god' by creating their own planets and controlling avatars in battle. Rule over planets teeming with adorable doods, explore dangerous dungeons, and battle other players using powerful Avatars. As a newborn god, will you choose between good and evil?

name: Apollo 13
summary: Apollo 13 is an adventure game that was developed and set to be published by Hi Tech Expressions, however was cancelled before release.

name: Apocalypse Lords
summary: The Apocalypse Begins! Select a supernatural being and plunge the world into chaos. Engage in epic battles against countless enemies, infecting and transforming them into servants while empowering your creature with diverse skills. Ascend to become the best apocalypse lord on the universe!

name: APlaceDominatedByHoles
summary: Turn-based role-playing game to help the protagonist find the truth

name: Apocalypse: Zombie City
summary: A third person shooter set in a zombie-infested city that, if left unresolved, will lead to the apocalyptic end of humanity.

name: Apex Legends: Resurrection
summary: For almost 300 years, Revenant was under the Syndicate’s thumb with the help of Hammond, and all he wanted was to escape. Now, suddenly, he starts to glitch—someone has launched a new protocol. He finds that he’s able to see enemies low on health, unleash a powerful leap forward, and forge a shroud of shadows around him that blocks incoming damage. But he also knows how to hold a grudge.

name: Apathy: Inaba Hyakumantetsu in Narugami Gakuen Reikaiki
summary:
A special feature on the school's Seven Wonders planned by Narukami Gakuen's newspaper club.
However, there are constant rumors that first-year student Shuichi Sakagami, who participated in the project, has gone missing after the meeting of the Seven Wonders.

The truth emerges while listening to the events of the day from Makoto Shindo, Yukihito Ayanokoji, Nozomu Kazama, Akemi Iwashita, and Tomoharu Hosoda, Shoji Arai and Reiko Fukuzawa, the storytellers of the Seven Wonders who participated in the meeting.

Did Shuichi Sakagami really go missing?

name: Ape Escape: On the Loose
summary: Experience Ape Escape: On the Loose originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: AploVVare Collection
summary: You found an old game console along with some games at a garage sale. You remember playing these as a kid, and couldn't resist getting it. Maybe you could give them a whirl, just for old time's sake?

name: Apothecary
summary: A cute story-driven zen puzzler in which you brew potions, customize your workshop, and interact with the quirky residents of the magical town of Mangrove.

name: AploVVare Collection:18+ DLC
summary: Legends say that there's some... "hidden content"... inside of some of the cartridges. Apparently you can dig them out by using a Game Succubus. Interested?

name: Apex Heroines
summary: Hack&Slash – Beat'em all! Six heroines, five types of weapons and adrenaline-pumping levels create an adrenaline rush you can't resist. Easy to learn and hard to master. 4K/120Hz & SteamDeck-ready. Everyone can enjoy the game!

name: Apocalipse Maromba
summary: Apocalipse Maromba is a quick 2D platform shooter game inspired by memes from the Brazilian bodybuilding and fitness universe, with its main objective on making the player smile! This is a parody that combines comedy, bodybuilding, and fun, without using real names, images, or brands.

name: Apassionata: A Passionate Horse-Show - My Show
A Past and Future Secret
summary: Medium-sized medieval stronghold surrounded by rocks and lava. A classic-style level in the spirit of Beyond Belief.

name: Ape Reunion
summary: An open world MMO RPG pixel art game using NFTs as characters.

name: Apinaraivo
summary: Large and exessively detailed IKbase level using some SOA entities and the Mega-Enforcer.

name: Apacies: Creatures of the Old West
summary: Apacies is a Turn Based Strategy game set in the Old West. Use the varied creatures found in the deputed land as your allies, as they are more powerful and reliable than bullets. The vast expanse of land is yours to explore, it's story yours to mold, and its history, yours to explore.

name: Ape Squad
summary:
New war start Aim, Shoot and Throw.
Advanced Military Actions in Modern Combat.

name: Apocryphauna
summary: Content Warning: contains depictions of transphobia, homophobia, religious extremism, and child abuse, along with brief violent and tryphopobic imagery.

name: Ape Escape Academy
summary: To become an expert in monkey business, you first have to go to monkey school, so enroll now at the craziest college the world has ever seen. You can work your way up through the school years by winning wacky mini-games but keep an eye on your classmates – students they may be, but when it comes to trouble and tomfoolery, these goofy monkeys are pros!

name: Apollo Cosmic
summary: Discover the far side of the moon, the effects of participating in MK Ultra on yourself, in this psychological thriller. Find what mystery awaits above and below the moon's surface as you are joined by an unexpected tour guide who wants to help you find the right path.

name: Apex Legends: Ignite
summary:
Rowenna grew up amidst a war, but in a move that turned the tide, one Monarch Titan sacrificed itself to end the fighting. In the years after, her home planet of Nexus established ties across the Outlands, introducing Rowenna to the Apex Games. The Games represented everything she aspired to–heroism, hard work, sacrifice—and she became a dedicated fan.

When her elder sister Diwa suffered a terrible injury at work, Rowenna resolved to support her family no matter what. She stole the battery from the Monarch, still rusting on the hill, and had a combat rig built with its battery at the core. She used it to qualify for the Apex Games, and even though the battery exposes her to poisonous radiation, she refuses to give up. No one else was going to get hurt to support her family. Rowenna’s choosing to have hope for her dreams or die trying. Now, it’s Conduit’s chance for a day in the sun.

name: Apex Rebels
summary: Players can control their racing destiny by choosing from five high-octane vehicles. At the start of each lap, they must pass through one of three checkpoints that will determine the driving route best suited for their racing style. Passing through progressive checkpoints gives speed boosts and unlocks advanced skills like Slipstream, Power Drifts, and Aero-Drifts. Aero-Drift is a ground-breaking technique that raises the car, allowing players to race through corners at blazing speeds, effortlessly overtaking their rivals. Every aspect of gameplay is designed to be thrilling and encourages a competitive spirit that sees players take down their rivals and jump into slipstreams to earn an extra boost, giving them an edge to seize victory!

name: Applied Energistics 2
summary: Applied Energistics 2 (AE2) is a comprehensive mod for Minecraft that introduces a unique approach to in-game inventory management. It presents a tech-based, futuristic theme, centered around the concept of using energy and technology to convert matter into energy and vice versa.

name: A Park Full of Cats
summary: Welcome to 'A Park Full of Cats,' a hidden object game that invites you to revel in the enchanting world of amusement parks! Experience the thrill and excitement of the rides and give those cats the fun they truly deserve!

name: A Park Full of Cats: Haunted Ride
summary: Prepare to be thrilled and chilled on "A Park Full of Cats: Haunted Ride",' the eerie downloadable content for 'A Park Full of Cats.' Embark on a ghostly adventure through six haunting scenarios! Are you brave enough to face the Haunted Ride?

name: Apartus
summary: A 2.5D medieval adventure RPG that follows Randall Colaric’s quest to recover King Joord’s lost relic in the realm of Belmoral.

name: Apu's Journey
summary: Apu's Journey is a retro action RPG, you can complete dungeons, defeat creatures, collect items, and improve your skills!

name: Apocalypse Party
summary: "Apocalypse Party" is a 3D top-down action Roguelike game. It's the brand-new sequel to "Plague Project Zero"! A new mission has begun! You will travel to the medieval era, where you'll gradually master firearms, melee weapons, magic, cursed witchcraft, summoning, and more. Through your choices, equip yourself to become the ultimate survivor. Before the apocalypse arrives, have one last wild celebration with your teammates!

name: Apex Rush
summary: Race, Drift & Stunt in this physics-based arcade racing game! Build and share your own tracks with the world and top the leaderboards!

name: A Posteriori
summary: An experience where you traverse through a fever dream.

name: Apocalypse Inc
summary: Welcome to Apocalypse Inc, the ultimate idle game where you take command of apocalyptic minions and unleash chaos upon the world!

name: Apple Bag
summary: Working the late-night shift as a cashier in a small town, you starts to form good relations with your regulars. Between flirtations and friendly banter, the specter of a mysterious disappearance haunts your nights as you’re exposed to more and more suspicious behaviors. Are your regulars linked to the missing student, and, more importantly, will you secure a Halloween date?

name: Apathy in Our Stars
summary: Meet some aliens, make some money, and save the galaxy while you're at it!

name: Apple Boy: Attack of Ice Cream Man
summary:
Welcome to Fruitbowl City! The villainous Ice Cream Man is seeking venegeance upon Apple Boy after being defeated by him. So, Apple Boy goes off to Ice Cream Man's Cloudy Castle to beat him up again.

This hack has 33 exits.

name: Apple Boy 2: Homebound Hero
summary:
After the events of Apple Boy: Attack of Ice Cream Man, Apple Boy's been sent to the fantastic world of Teylornia! He doesn't want to be there, though, so after getting a helpful tip from a bald olding man, he sets out to collect the 12 Teleportation Gems, so he can get home to his beloved Fruitbowl City.

This hack has 45 exits.

name: Aprende con Horacio: La Gran Aventura de las Palabras
summary: "La gran aventura de las palabras" (The Great Adventure of Words), also known as "Aprende con Horacio" (Learn with Horacio), is an educational game by the Anaya publishing house where you play with the great Horacio, Rodolfato, and Alfabeto, crossing their entire labyrinth house full of puzzles, reading challenges, and all sorts of language-related games.

name: Apeiron
summary: Apeiron is an Open World Third-Person Story-Driven Action RPG set in a fantasy-created setting known as the Realm of Paradise, where you play as four companions. In Eternity, experience unique combat through our weapon stance system and progressing gameplay, creating immersive ability combinations.

name: Apple Hero
summary: Apple Hero is a puzzle game in which you lead the hero to the goal. Create a path for the hero by placing apples, BUT the twist is that the hero always moves only to the closest apple. Avoid dangers, collect coins and solve all the puzzles!

name: Apocalypse Party & 20 Minutes Till Dawn: Free Thanking DLC
summary: This thrilling free DLC combines with "20 Minutes Till Dawn's" strategic depth. Cross-game heroes infuse "Apocalypse Party" with tactics and abilities. With three innovative weapons and talents, players now have more ways to combat and strategize in this end-of-days showdown.

name: Apex Ninja
summary: This is a fast-paced action-adventure game. Five female ninjas are trapped in a time loop set by the Demon Lord. Become the Ninja King and break the time loop!

name: Aperture Ireland
summary: Aperture Ireland tells the story of a test subject in one of Aperture's regional branches. Solve puzzles and dodge bullets as you start to unravel the facility's dark secret.

name: Aperture: Salt Mines
summary: Aperture: Salt Mines is a community-made modification for Portal 2. Set in the same universe as the original games, descend into the heart of Aperture in the year 1998, shortly after the death of Cave Johnson.

name: Apple II Sudoku
summary: A Sudoku game for Apple II.

name: Aperture
summary: This is a first-person 3D puzzle game, inspired by modern societal and work-related mental health challenges. Players immerse themselves in the role of a person with mental illness, using "Aperture" to solve puzzles and uncover hidden memories.

name: Apex Legends: Breakout
summary: The Games are going into overdrive, legends. Drop hotter and hit different with Legend Upgrades—a new system that puts the meta in your hands by unlocking enhancements for armor and abilities. Each match is a fresh start and there’s no better time than now to try new strats on for size. Ranked returns reloaded and ready, tuned to a high-risk high-reward system that incentivizes combat through each split—yup, splits are back. Plus, make your Thunderdome debut in Mixtape, the Frontier’s deadliest entertainment venue. And that’s not all—Performance Mode, Breakout Rewards, a 5th Anniversary Collection Event, and even more. We’re bringing the noise for a fantastic 5th Anniversary season.

name: A.P.B.
summary: A port of the Arcade game APB for Atari Lynx.

name: APB
summary: A port of the Arcade game APB for Amstrad CPC.

name: APB
summary: A port of the Arcade game APB for Commodore 64.

name: APB
summary: A port of the Arcade game APB for Atari ST.

name: APB
summary: A port of the Arcade game APB for DOS.

name: APB
summary: A port of the Arcade game APB for ZX Spectrum.

name: Apocalypse Love Shelter
summary: Zombie apocalypse world! You built a shelter in advance, and countless girls wanted to enter your shelter for self-protection. Female neighbor, flight attendant, female boss, celebrity... All beings are equal before the end of time.

name: Apartment of Death
summary: Venture into the abandoned jungle apartment, embody lone survivor Ross, on a gripping adventure. College friends Joanna and Ivan went missing here. You must unravel mysteries room-by-room while evading a lurking killer's attacks. Can you pierce the enigmas and escape unscathed?

name: A Prelude to Chaos
summary: The Cyborg Queen is coming. Only you stand in her way. Find and destroy generators to save the day.

name: A Prelude to Chaos
summary: The Cyborg Queen is coming. Only you stand in her way. Collect power jewels to slow down her plans.

name: Apex Defenders
summary: Modular and co-op action-based endless combat simulator.

name: A part of me
summary: The target audience for this game is one single person in the whole world.

name: Apartment No 129
summary: Emir, who has an interest in mysterious events, steps alone into the abandoned apartment known as "Apartment No 129" to trace the trail of a paranormal event that occurred in 2009 and shook the country. However, he will find himself in an unexpected confrontation within this cursed apartment.

name: A Proper Cup of Tea
summary: Terry Cavanagh guides you through making the perfect S-rank cup of tea.

name: Applaydu
summary: Digitalize your toys from the Kinder Surprise chocolate by scanning the figurines or QR codes. You can then play with your characters, play minigames and design your own avatar and while doing this your kids can learn the world.

name: April 24th
summary: The main character is an experienced journalist who always strives to uncover the truth. He manages to gain access to the house, which is guarded by the police.

name: Apex Automata
summary: Get ready for an epic showdown against rebel machines in Android Resistance, a frenetic top-down shooter that challenges your skills and strategy. Take on the role of Adrian-317, the wise Vanguard, and assemble a diverse team of androids, each with their unique abilities.

name: Apartment Love Triangle
summary: You’ve found the perfect apartment… The only problem is, it’s for couples only! Navigate your way through the crazy antics of a new city, a new job, and an unexpected love triangle—with four gorgeous bachelors to choose from, you'll never have a dull moment! Will you be able to keep up with the drama and find your true love?

name: Apex Legends: Upheaval
summary:
When Alter emerged from her dimension into another (with her past held close to the chest), she had only two things: her interdimensional traveling Void tech, and a desire to have fun. She stole the fanciest of foods, learned to fight through dicey situations, and took on odd jobs for personal favors–though she didn’t have a problem double-crossing her clients if it was more beneficial or amusing. Never needing to stick around for the consequences of her actions eroded any sense of morality or responsibility she had. She could focus on what was important: making sure life was never mundane.

Alter was drawn to worlds on the edge of complete destruction. Whether something devastating was already happening or she helped usher in the apocalypse herself, she was there to watch whatever catastrophe ensued. It was only in those moments, after all, that people took off the masks they always wore and she could see their true selves.

Finding these world-ending events was a toss up. Sometimes she’d find what she was looking for, and on others, she’d have missed the main event in worlds already ruined. But in some of these ruined worlds, Alter began to notice an interesting commonality…

Many of these worlds hadn’t met their end by some random event; they had been destroyed by the same person.

[Redacted]

name: Apomo District
summary: Explore a world that changes everyday where you’ll hunt weird monsters called ‘Apomo.’ Catch and cook fish to get buffs, collect bugs to cast spells, and find gear to fit your play style.

name: Apples Busy Day
summary: Apples Busy Day is a short and cozy game about exploring and helping your silly neighbors. Come check out all Apple has to do on the island of fruit!

name: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney - Appeal to Truth
summary: Appeal to Truth is a four-case fan game developed in PyWright, taking place in alternate timeline during the Apollo Justice era.

name: Apples And Bananas
summary: Embark on an epic fruit-filled adventure as Jack the Apple, battling brainwashed banana soldiers in this top-down 2D pixel shooter to stop Dr. Banana's evil plans!

name: Apocalyptic Shadows
summary: This game is set in a fictional post-apocalyptic Western Europe. They must use their wits and skills to survive in dangerous environments. On the road of adventure, players will encounter thrilling moments and feel an unparalleled tension and sense of accomplishment.

name: Apocalyptic cat
summary: Apocalyptic Cat is an atmospheric hardcore platformer about a little black cat's journey in a post-apocalyptic world. Overcome toxic clouds, spikes, and obstacles, striving to fulfill his last dream of reaching paradise.

name: Apex Legends: PlayStation Plus Play Pack
Apano Syn Fighter
summary: Is there a gamepad lying around somewhere?!! Ready to play some real shooter games again? Grab the controller and become an APANO SYN PILOT to face the alien invasion. Connect up to four controllers and shoot until you drop. 100% survival chance on "Easy", low on "Impossible".

name: Apocalypse Delivery Service
summary: Apocalypse Delivery Service is an exciting survival and adventure game. You will enter a post-apocalyptic world where you play as a courier delivering packages. But don't think it will be easy! Your task is to find necessary items, survive, and most importantly, escape from the city.

name: A Place in the Sun
summary: A Place In The Sun is a short point & click adventure game with an interface similar to the classical games from Lucas Arts. You play the protagonist in his endeavour to make some coffee to survive yet another night of overworking, while trying to handle his complaining ex-wife as well as to cope with his bad conscience regarding his neglected daughter. For players familiar with adventure games it shouldn't take more than 30-45 minutes to complete the game, while for players unfamiliar with the genre it will probably take a bit longer.

name: A Prelude to an Adventure
summary:
Hey! If you got about 5-10 minutes, then come and help an adventurer to prepare for a mysterious trip to the Land of the White Elephants. A Prelude to an Adventure is a little interactive experience with light puzzle elements, tons of animations and catchy music. Have fun!

Originally made for LOWREZJAM 2020 and then updated for MAGS August 2020 and then updated again to current version.

name: Apples and Oranges
summary: Late in the day, an older lady approaches one of her local prosecutors to enquire about a case of discrimination. Meanwhile, someone is remembering an absurd event from their early days in an office.

name: Apprehension Arizona
summary: A map set around the Arizona desert in which Duke must infiltrate a former EDF base that has been overrun by alien maggots.

name: Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Ninja Leader
Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Summer Candy
Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Flower Fairy
Apex Heroines: Character Outfit - Dark Maid
Apple
summary: How do you like them apples? Because we have them all! Have time in the game or click the apple to get your favorite apple.

name: Ape Escape M
summary: Ape Escape M takes the core concepts of the console Ape Escape games and brings them into a 2D game with an overhead perspective. The story is similar to the original Ape Escape in that it has you playing as Spike as he tries to stop Specter and his army of apes, but it does take place after the first game. In each level, you’re tasked with capturing most of the apes with your net before you can advance. You also have other gadgets, such as the stun club, radar, and slingshot that can be used to track the apes and stun them for easier capture. As you explore each level, you can find healing items, items that grant additional lives, and enemies that can only be defeated and not captured. Some levels also have doors that lead back to hidden areas in previous levels if you can find the key to unlock them. There are 121 apes in total to catch across five different worlds and in-game achievements can also be unlocked based on the player’s accomplishments.

name: Apple Run
summary: A fun twist on the classic video game 'snake'! You are a free roaming snake collecting apples and avoiding lava. Complete challenges, customize your snake and unlock achievements. What is the maximum score you can get?

name: A Pair of Feathers Squawk Together
summary: "A Pair Of Feathers Squawk Together" is an easy-to-play, challenging-to-beat platformer inspired by the likes of Jump King and Bread & Fred. Flap the Parrot only has two controls: a right flap, to flap to the right, and a left flap, to flap to the left. As you get higher up the island, you'll encounter new regions with new gimmicks and traps to be wary of. Avoid getting sent back to the ocean down below, and find the treasure at the peak!

name: Apogea
summary: Apogea is a medieval fantasy massively online multiplayer role playing game.

name: Apprehending the Adventuer Chan!: Live2D Tentacles Simulator
summary: A tentacle training simulator developed specifically for experienced players. Players will control tentacles to fully train the captured adventurer-chan. All animations are rendered in full Live2D, providing immediate feedback based on various actions to satisfy your desires for tentacle training!

name: Apexaris Tower
summary:
Climb your way up the dangerous Apexaris Technologies Tower for your only chance at a cure. Many have tried and failed, could you be the first?

Careful where you step you could possibly fall all the way back to the start! avoid the zappers in each section, they will zap you back to an unfortunate location.

Use your special high tech boots to traverse the tower with double jump/ Dash! combining those with upgrades like Hover, Triple Jump, and a Surprise!

Warning: Rage may follow

name: Apprehend
summary: This game features a white little character riding a mount that can spew fire

name: Apple Clicker
summary: Easy clicker game for apple enjoyers!

name: Apes vs. Zombies
summary:
Everything was so idyllic, but one day a horde of zombies appeared and stole your beloved Jane.

In Apes vs. Zombies, you will help our chief ape “Kong” defend his kingdom against the imminent zombie invasion and rescue your girlfriend Jane. What are you waiting for? Grab your bazooka and gather your monkey friends to give the zombies a good bang for their buck and free your Jane.

name: Apartment Story
summary: A third-person thriller about three people and a gun in a single apartment. Navigate escalating real-time narrative events whilst managing Sims-esq stats to stay strong for an inevitable showdown. You play as Arthur, a young man trying to make it day to day before a gun turns his life upside down.

name: Apex Legends: Shockwave
summary: Grab the squad, because the Games have a whole new energy! Drop back into the fight with Revivals, feel your power surge with Akimbo, use two new Battle Sense features to narrow in on your enemies in the heat of the fight, and more updates that make the Outlands legendary for all. Hone your skills in Bot Royale and hit new heights in E-District, your very own neon playground. Customize Stat Trackers to suit your needs or your ships, and you’ll automatically unlock three new ones for logging in this season. Time to Tap in, Legend.

name: Apartment 14-B
summary:
Apartment 14-B is a short visual novel set in the same world as Kowloon's Curse.

Follow Fujimoto and Yukimura, two D.I.M.S. agents, as they solve the case of a man who was found dead in his apartment.

Gather evidence, interview suspects, and solve the mystery of Apartment 14-B.

name: Aprenda Libras
summary: 'Aprenda Libras' is a game aimed at teaching Libras - Brazilian Sign Language. It's an educational game used for both literacy and basic Libras teaching. It's a light, multiplatform, point-click game with a low degree of difficulty.

name: Apex Legends: PlayStation Plus Play Pack
summary:
Join the Apex Games ready for battle with the PlayStationPlus Play Pack. This collection of content will trick out specific weapons and Legends in special gear.

This pack includes:
-2 character skins (Loba & Wattson)
-2 weapon skins (30-30 Repeater , C.A.R.)
-2 banners (Loba & Wattson)

name: Apple Catch
summary: Collect ten apples in your basket to win.

name: Apartment 606
summary: Begin your new night shift working from home, but beware, this apartment harbors dark secrets. Can you survive all five harrowing nights?

name: Apico 3.0: What Lies Beeneath
summary: Apico 3.0: What Lies Beeneath invites you to dive into the crystal blue ocean waters surrounding the Apico archipelago and explore its depths. New areas, forageables, quests, and, of course, new bees are yours to discover deep bee-low the watery abyss.

name: A Purr Tale
summary: A Purr Tale, a 20 minutes game where you live the life of a little cat at his home. Soon you realize that everything wasn't as well as he thought.

name: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney 4
summary: Set in the year 2029, it continues to follow the career of Apollo Justice, who is forced to find a new underage magician assistant after every other character from AJ1 leaves for Hawaii. He soon becomes acquainted with a brand new cast of characters, and, of course, becomes involved in a number of unusual murders and cases.

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - 1995 Tokubetsu-hen
April 8th
summary: In April, when cherry blossoms flutter through the air, a gruesome discovery is made—a blood-soaked corpse in a quiet town.

name: Apple Climbers
summary:
Apple Climbers is a hand based locomotion game featuring the wonderful fruit, apples!

It's a simple game, but with a big twist! Instead of moving normally with your thumbstick, you have to move with your controllers!

name: Apex Racer
summary: APEX Racer strives to deliver the most authentic representation of the tuning culture. Dozens of cars and hundreds of parts available for you to plan and build your ultimate ride. Trick out your project car with our robust tuning system, express yourself and make your car shine. New parts are always being added, so there's always a bit of something for everyone!

name: Apex Racer
summary: Build, Customize, Race! Take on the world's best racers as you race through elaborate fast-paced tracks in the most thrilling racing simulation experience on mobile! Inspired by a popular toy that was introduced in Asia back in the 90s. It is a plastic model race car without a remote control. These model race cars are mostly referred to as Mini 4WD due to its all-wheel-drive nature

name: Apocalypse Secrets
summary: You will have to explore the devastated world after a global catastrophe in search of various items. In this 3D arcade in genre "find and click" you need to flying across the map, you will be searching for different objects.

name: Apricity
summary: Fight, farm and bake your way through ancient canals and the crumbling castles of APRICITY. Gather strength by fishing waterways, harvesting ingredients and slaying ancient beasts. Rekindle the lost light and push back the hungering darkness.

name: A Punk with Wheels
summary: A punk with a wheels is a point and click game. It's a parody of the 80's punk culture. The protagonist is Cody and he will lead you in a funny story in a drama universe. Help him to investigate to know what he did last night. You will meet a lot of weird original characters in a black humour story. Enjoy!

name: A Pinky Problem
summary:
Skye has lots of friends! That's because she's the coolest girl you've ever met: stylish, and kind, and talented, and bad at keeping her mouth shut when she needs to.

You said you'd keep her secret safe, but she hasn't been making it easy. As the years flew by, her secret grew bigger, until you found yourself snarled in a web of lies and questionable choices.

With your biggest hurdle looming over the horizon, you've got a stressful three days ahead of you.

How far will you go to fulfil your promise?

name: A Paper Mario Puzzle Game
summary:
A Paper Mario -themed puzzle game. Can you reach the target score before the time runs out?
Use items and partners to score more points.

name: April Freebee
summary: April Freebee is an April Fools game which was disguised as an instrument for the Kontakt Player.

name: Appetit
summary: A mixed reality cooking assistant to improve your life in the kitchen!

name: Apex Legends: PlayStation Plus Play Pack
Apocalypse Shop Simulator
summary: Apocalypse Shop Simulator is a sandbox game set in a post-nuclear war world. Buy goods and sell them to customers.

name: APUS: Bird Simulator
summary: Have you ever dreamed of truly flying? Experience the raw freedom of the skies as the fastest bird in the world. Feel the rush of adrenaline as you glide through air currents and master the intricate art of flight. This isn't just a game—it's the ultimate flight experience.

name: A Person Stands on an Empty Stage
summary: A surrealist game about acting, identity, and words.

name: Apocalypse Express
summary: Conduct, upgrade and repair your train through endless waves of enemies in a post-apocalyptic setting. In this action management roguelike, the player decides to embark on a journey through the wasteland looking to fulfill the dream of seeing the remains of the outside world.

name: A Pizza Delivery
summary: A Pizza Delivery is a narrative exploration game with puzzle elements focused on connecting with people. Share pizza with charming characters to uncover their stories—and your own. Drive and explore a strange, meditative world filled with secrets.

name: App Driver + John The Zombie
summary:
Take on the role of an App Driver
+ eat brains to gain skills from them like biking, driving, horseback riding, fishing, climbing, shooting hoops, running

name: Apple Tree
summary: In Apple Tree, an idle game, plant seeds and wait for fruits to grow. Be patient and watch the miracle unfold. With a serene atmosphere and simple mechanics, it offers a relaxing experience. Whether taking a break or seeking a meditative activity, Apple Tree provides a tranquil escape.

name: Apple Orchard Escape
summary: Overview: Run around an apple orchard as Val, she is the pumpkin headed mascot of a rival pumpkin patch to the apple orchard that she finds herself at. Don't make too much noise or you'll be caught!

name: Apico 4.0: Hive of Industry
summary: A new free update now available for the bee-loved beekeeping sim APICO on PC and Nintendo Switch! Update 4.0: A Hive of industry, introduces new automation machines, new pets, a new craftable resource, new seasonal events, and much more!

name: Apex Legends: From the Rift
summary: Go original and experience the beginning of Apex Legends again. Relive the rush of that first drop in Launch Royale then get reacquainted with Lifeline, revived with new abilities to take the frontlines, glide to reposition, and more. Tear through the Outlands with Rift Relics, offering cosmic abilities and weapons that dial up your power. Wield the Raptor’s Claw, a new Universal Mythic Melee Cosmetic and harness the madness of science in the new Battle Pass Split 1.

name: Apartment Dream
summary:
Apartment Dream is a game about exploring memories through art.

Follow MONA on her somber-hued adventure as she seeks to complete the magical picture book left behind by her deceased mother. As you explore the building she lives in and meet all of its unique residents, you'll realize this truly is your Apartment Dream.

name: Aporkalypse: Pigs of Doom
summary: We have a pig problem! According to an old prophecy the four Pigs of Doom should proclaim the end of the world in a distant future. But something went terribly wrong and the gates of heaven and hell have already opened! Now it is up to the greedy Hunger Pig, the heavily armed War Pig, the contaminous Pest Pig and the ghostly Death Pig to stop this madness.

name: Apple Man
summary: Apple Man is no ordinary fruit... Due to a mysterious force beyond anyone's comprehension, He has been blessed with two unbreakable legs, and a myriad of special abilities. With his newfound power, he is absolutely determined to accomplish his lifelong dream of reaching the sky.

name: Apex Legends: Takeover
summary: There’s no better way to kick off year seven of Apex Legends than upping the heat of battle. Two heavy hitters that have been in the background a bit too long make their way center stage with updates worthy of Apex Predators, and revamped perks raise up the rest of the Assault Class. No weapon is a bad weapon with buffs across the board for every piece that you can get your hands on. This new meta is cooking and it’s safe to say that this anniversary season flips the season of Support to one of aggression. Coupled with some strong updates for Armor and Helmets, greater access to weapons with the new Arsenals, and reduced visual clutter and time-to-kill has never been faster. It’s a whole new Outlands—be ready to fight.

name: Apartment Filled With Cats
summary: Uncover the purr-fect challenge in Apartment Filled With Cats! Explore charming, hand-drawn apartment filled with whimsical details as you search for cleverly hidden cats. Can you find them all? A relaxing, delightful journey awaits!

name: Apothecurse
summary: A mysterious letter compels Leon, an alchemist, to brave the seas and travel across the world to Port Gelour, a cast in shadow. Craft potent potions, befriend quirky locals, and uncover the dark secrets lurking beneath the waves in a quest for alchemy and discovery!

name: Appulse
summary: Discover pinball like never before with Appulse! The game is a roguelite shooter, where you protect a Galactic Federation ship! Upgrade your ball, your weapons and your ship to pushback waves of unwavering robots.

name: Apocalypse Approaches
summary: Apocalypse Approaches is a fast-paced top-down roguelike where time controls your health, magic, and currency. Battle through procedurally generated dungeons and defeat enemies to regain lost time. Upgrade your weapon, cast powerful spells, and survive as the clock constantly ticks down.

name: A Paranormal Story
summary: A Paranormal Story is an investigation and suspense game where you must try to understand the past and secrets of the cell phone owner, through old messages, notes and mysterious apps through a fake smartphone interface.

name: Ape Drop
summary: A action puzzle game, punch and push your way up and reach new heights as fast as possible!

name: Aporia in the Dark
summary: Solve the puzzles to escape. There are 5 puzzles in total, which can be played in any order as the player wants.

name: Apocalypse Carnival
summary: This game is an exhilarating racing adventure where four characters compete simultaneously.

name: Apocalypse Island
summary: As an ex-scientist on a mission, you find yourself in a toxic and infected island, where humans are no where to be seen. Build, explore and survive.

name: Apple Ring
summary: Apple Ring is a free multiplayer online game. Players can win apples and become the winner in each match. Apples and rings are convertible, enhancing your community collection in the future. Real-time communication with others is possible during the game.

name: Apricity
summary: Apricity is a top-down shooter party game for 1-4 players. 11 character classes. Arcade-style gameplay with a text-adventure driven roguelike mode and a score attack endless mode.

name: A Prison Digging Game
summary: You are in prison and want to escape. To do so, you can only dig a hole. Luckily, you have a map in hand. Read it carefully and use your digging power to find your way to freedom. Look for fossils, pipelines, and antique objects to locate yourself on the map.

name: April Grove
summary: Undertake your new job as a forester in a mystic and peaceful wood. Chop, gather, level up and unravel the expansive forest and its splendor at your own pace, one log at a time!

name: Apocalypse
summary: Apocalypse is a multi-user dungeon (MUD) built on a codebase called DIKU. The code has been modified over the course of about twenty-six years to come into its current state. Apocalypse draws heavily upon the world of Athas and the lore of Dark Sun.

name: Aperture Narbacular
summary: A re-imagining of Nuclear Monkey Software's 'Narbacular Drop' built from the ground up for Portal to celebrate Narbacular Drop's 20th Anniversary.

name: Apex Legends: Prodigy
summary:
It's time to Take Your Shot in Apex Legends: Prodigy! Step into the spotlight with new Legend Sparrow, an agile archer with a habit of showing off, set your sights on glory with explosive new updates to the Bocek. Energize it with Frag Grenades to make Explosive Arrows! Now’s your chance to take aim and target greatness!

But that’s just the start. Carve out a new legacy and return to the hallowed grounds of Arenas. You’ll get your chance to stand out with Ranked updates like the new Ranked Ladder and its rewards. Pathfinder even got some new buffs, like double charge on his Tactical and Ultimate abilities. Plus, shine like a rising star with cosmetics from the Prodigy Battle Pass!*

name: Apathy: Danshikou de Atta Kowai Hanashi
Appetité Amor
summary: Warrior Girl Fianna stumbles upon a cafe owned by an otherworldly cook and his drool-worthy dishes.

name: Apollo 11 VR
summary: Apollo 11 VR is the story of the greatest journey ever taken by humankind. This VR experience is a recreation of the events which took place between July 16th and July 24th 1969. Now for the first time ever you get to experience this historic event through the eyes of those who lived through it.

name: Apollo
summary: Apollo is a short platformer made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 155: Wind.

name: Apocalypse Zombie TD
summary: 《Apocalypse Zombie TD》is a Tower Defense Game. You will collect resources and build fortifications before the zombies arrive to kill the zombies that invade your home. In the game, you will unlock different defensive buildings, create a unique style, defend your home in a world full of zombies.

name: Apocalypse? No!
summary: In Apocalypse? No! you play as a survivor accompanied by his faithful dog in a world in ruins, survive against the creatures, help the characters of this world, discover very varied maps: From a peaceful forest, through survivor camps to ruined cities.

name: Apt. 407
summary: A psychological horror game set in a Korean apartment building. Explore eerie occurrences throughout the complex and uncover the truth behind them.

name: Appeeling Personality
summary:
Enter an eating contest, leave with a date!

In this unusual eating contest, you begin to feel delirious and see the bananas talking to you! Each banana has a different yet dazzling personality and they are sure to charm you! Beware, however! If you don't keep eating, you'll starve!

Make your choice! Find true love or be victorious!

name: ApocaShift
summary: ApocaShift is a dynamic roguelite extraction looter set in a constantly evolving apocalyptic world. The environment shifts based on in-game events and decisions, offering fresh challenges and opportunities with each playthrough.

name: Apocalypse of the Universe
summary: In Apocalypse of Universe, players step into the shoes of an elf hero on a mission to save his homeland from a demonic invasion.

name: Apocalypse Survivors
summary: As the savior of the apocalypse, take up your weapons and unleash your powers. Rescue survivors, confront waves of zombies, and through relentless searching, become an immortal warrior. Write your own glorious legend in this plague-ridden hell.

name: A Planet Full of Cats
summary: A Planet Full of Cats is a hidden object adventure with metroidvania-style exploration — in true Devcats fashion. Explore diverse biomes, unlock new powers and uncover ancient secrets!

name: Apothecary of City X
summary: Run a warm, cosy apothecary in a cold, dark city. Grim-cosy management sim with card combat and loveable weirdos.

name: A Package for Space
summary: A real race against time, your priorities will be the key to success..

name: Aphelion
summary: Stranded on a frozen planet, astronaut Ariane must brave rugged landscapes and shifting realities to rescue her wounded partner, Thomas. This action-packed sci-fi adventure blends exploration, traversal, and tense stealth gameplay.

name: Apokerlypse
summary: Apokerlypse is a strategic deckbuilding Roguelike where classic poker game gets a demonic twist. Step into a post-apocalyptic tavern as a skilled cardsharp. Wield demonic chips to bend the rules of play, outwit players across the globe, and climb the ranks to become the ultimate master of the deck!

name: Aperture Dating Simulator
summary: After a missing employee leaves a maintenance position vacant, Aperture swoops you out of manufacturing to take his place. Will you stay true to your contract, or fall for your subordinates?

name: April 18st
summary: A short collection of interviews of the Horse Race Tests winning horses.

name: Apocalypse Tale
summary: This is a post-apocalyptic survival farming game where you can plant crops, chop wood, fish, mine, trade, play the stock market—but most importantly, plan how to stay alive.

name: A Passing in the Night
summary: Immerse yourself in a third-person adventure game in which you take a timed, one hour-long night walk. Explore a reactive and surreal neighborhood where reality bends and spirits lurk in the shadows. Converse with other lost wanderers and reclaim hope in a bleak world.

name: ApplePop
summary: A fast-paced puzzle game where you match apples to make 10! Play solo, battle friends in PvP, team up in co-op mode, or challenge AI opponents in this addictive number matching adventure.

name: Apartment 22
summary: Apartment 22 is a bite-sized horror game about being trapped in a loop. You look out for clues left by the previous resident or possibly by you to escape the apartment.

name: Apocalypse PD!
summary: Shoot down waves of paratroopers before they hit the ground. Time your shots. Make every bullet count. No tutorials. No mercy. Just pure reflex and cold nerves – just like it used to be.

name: A Pirate Game About Digging for Treasure and Getting Drunk
