summary: A pirate game about digging through a treasure-filled dungeon, which you can then spend on booze at the bar. Collect as much gold as possible and beware of the dangers that lurk in the shadows...

name: Apocalypse Truck Simulator
summary: Take control of powerful, all terrain vehicles and deliver various cargoes across a challenging, broken, post apocalyptic world.

name: Apparatus: Exanimus
summary: Apparatus: Exanimus is a walking simulator/exploration game with horror elements, aesthetically imitating (and explicitly pretending to be) a lost game developed in 1998 by a company long out of business.

name: Apartment Complex
summary: You play as a 40 something year old man who is a co-landlord. You begin seeing strange things. These very same things put you onto a path where you change into someone you can love.

name: Apoclone
summary: In a world ruined by rogue science, you are the Commander of a clone squad fighting to restore order. Summon powerful Titans, build the perfect lineup, and battle through a wasteland teeming with chaos.

name: App Empire Tycoon
summary: Live the dream of an ambitious developer in App Empire Tycoon! Start small, crafting simple apps and tackling tricky clients. Grow your skills, attract investors, and expand your portfolio as you chase greatness. Can you build the ultimate tech empire and make history?

name: Aphrodite's Bathhouse
summary: Can you conquer the challenges of the maidens?

name: A Porter Story
summary: Step into the worn boots of a Porter and remove the trash inside a towering post-apocalyptic apartment complex. Shoot the breeze with tenants while steering clear of otherworldly phantoms. All in a day's work.

name: Aphasie
summary: Aphasie is an open-world immersive sim of action and stealth that puts you in the role of Mastema, the Angel of Cataclysms. Explore the dynamic environment of the city of Babel, use your powers, stealth, or a wide array of weapons and tools to bring down the tower.

name: Apocalypse Survivor
summary: Days of Ruin is a third-person post-apocalyptic zombie shooter featuring procedurally generated equipment stats and infinitely replayable maps. Players can repeatedly farm maps to acquire better gear and prepare for greater challenges!

name: A Pig Game: A Pee Wee Premiere
summary: Join Pee Wee the Polka Dotted Pig - your silent (but determined) ceramic protagonist on a mission to collect toothpicks! Flip, fling, and fly through a kitchen full of cozy characters and curious quests!

name: Apocalyptic Pussy
summary: Apocalyptic Pussy is a visual novel in which you have to survive in a world of apocalypse. Run away from zombies, meet beautiful girls and make love to survive.

name: A Place Far Away
summary: After the catastrophe that almost decimated humanity, Anya and her father Caledon can only rely on each other to survive. Embark on a journey of self-discovery, love, friendship and purpose in A Place Far Away.

name: Appa
summary: Appa is a narrative driven simultaneous card game about two siblings dealing with the death of their father. You play as Varun witnessing surreal nightmares and manifestations of his deceased father and playing a card game with him.

name: Apex Armor Swap Trainer
summary: The 100% accurate representation of the Armor Swap system from Apex Legends. Use your real game Mouse Sensitivity and Field of View parameters and choose your training mode. Now you're ready to become the best Armor Swapper in the world.

name: Apex Ascent
summary: Apex Ascent is a fast-paced climbing platformer where danger lurks on every wall. Dodge deadly boxing gloves that punch out from the surfaces, leap over spinning obstacles, and time your moves to avoid searing lasers. Reach the top or fall trying.

name: A Pinball Game That Makes You Mad
summary: Bounce your way to the summit in this challenging pinball rage climbing game. Collect unique themes, master brutal challenges, and race for better ranks across various interconnected worlds.

name: A Planet of Mine Mastermine Edition
summary: A Planet of Mine Mastermine Edition is a cozy 4X game with mass strategy! Choose your winning gang, mastermine resources, and build your base and tools to boost your technology and conquer space! Unless your neighbors don’t see it that way… Trade, peace or clash: your planet, your choice!

name: Apocalypse Rush
summary: Face endless hordes of enemies in Apocalypse Rush! Survive as long as you can using crazy weapons, special abilities, and defensive items. Unlock skins, upgrade your gear, and push your limits in this fast-paced action game!

name: Apollo Sonata
summary: At night, the campus is full of urban legends—bloody toilets, garbled blackboards, a path to the underworld, and a piano playing on the rooftop. Play as Miu, Juniper, and MOMO across three playthroughs to uncover the supernatural mysteries. Can their friendship reveal the truth?

name: Apes Warfare
summary: Lead your ape army to victory in APES WARFARE, a modern turn-based strategy game. Command diverse units, outsmart your enemies, and conquer dynamic battlefields. Test your tactics in the solo campaign or challenge players worldwide in thrilling online multiplayer battles.

name: Apocalypse Meow
summary: The fur flies in a post-human wasteland where cats have to claw their way through a world overrun by crazy human factions. Equip yourself with weapons to battle through chaotic missions and uncover the secrets behind humanity's downfall. It's a world where cats don't just survive but they dominate.

name: Approaching Infinity: Shipyards
summary: Design your own custom starting ship with a point-based system and access to every weapon and device in the game. Tow 5-deck shipwrecks to get more points. Space stations will offer more ships for sale, and the asteroid base will have a brand new ship upgrade service: the Shipwright!

name: Apparition: Player vs. Players
summary: Apparition is a 5-player asymmetric horror game where 4 ghost hunters face off against a player-controlled ghost. Investigate haunted locations, gather evidence, complete objectives, and banish the entity, or become the ghost and hunt the living yourself.

name: Approximately Up
summary: Build, crash, rebuild! Explore new planets with your fully modular spaceship made from whatever bolts together long enough to fly. Mount giant thrusters, annoying cables, and everything in between. Complete wild missions, face the dangers of space and argue with your crew!

name: Apocalyptica
summary: Fight, Mine, Explore, Survive, Build, Fortify, Adapt. Conquer the apocalypse as you build a base to survive the wild lands.

name: Apollo
summary: You can play with gravity in this open-world labyrinthe,open doors, solve puzzles, without any hints or hand-holding option. This early access level showcases the core mechanics and delivers a cool retro nostalgic, and a non-linear experience... because it's not a corridor game.

name: Apocalypter
summary: Apocalypter is a post-apocalyptic, driving, survival, fps, open-world game. Fight, help, trade with different factions. Find different cars and customize them. Scavenge, loot and survive the procedurally generated, open world of Apocalypter.

name: Apples in the Abyss
summary: A puzzle platformer passion project where you manipulate the fabric of space to collect some apples. Tear holes, rotate chunks, and mirror entire columns of space across each other. Collect all the apples with a given set of abilities in each stage.

name: Aphantasia
summary: Aphantasia is a choice-driven adventure game following Roudert, the Son of Drop, as he ventures across the island of Mollagit to rescue his friend known as The Mouse. Players journey alongside three companions - Largo, Mustaeyed, and Caleidoface - making decisions that shape the narrative outcome while encountering various inhabitants of this peculiar world marked by unconventional characters and dark humor.

name: Apocryphoid
summary:
In the afterlife you realize you are trapped in a cyber space as a digital spirit. Now you have to fight the digital Angel Virus to free your new dimension.

The game is a Boss Rush Bullet Hell shooter with upgrades. Fight 10 different bosses and try to defeat a secret boss for better ending!

name: Appel
summary: Appel is a platformer game created by Griffpatch. In this game, you play as Appel, and adventure through the world of Appelmoshapje. Navigate through each level, collecting as many yellow apples as you can, then face Micro Manager and restore peace to the world. The game has 9 levels, a level editor, and much more.

name: Apex Path: Bolt
summary: Fast-paced first-person parkour through a futuristic city. Run, wallride, dash, and uncover the truth behind Bolt and his darker half, Incarnate. and all the other runners.

name: Apees
summary: Apees is a fast‑paced shooter where two teams face off: the Puffer Blasters and the Puffer Diffusers. The Puffer Blasters carry a volatile puffer fish that they must plant in a designated water zone, while the Puffer Diffusers work to stop them and prevent the plant from happening. Teamwork, timing, and strategy decide the winner.

name: A Philosophical Discussion of Worms
summary: A Philosophical Discussion of worms is a Kinetic Visual Novel that explores two characters, Vynder and Ophiel, as they navigate cohabitation in a strange, unfamiliar house when they don't speak the same language.

name: Appetite of the Abyss
summary: Appetite of the Abyss is a survival cooking roguelite where your tribe’s fate depends on feeding an abyssal creature, learning its tastes through cooking, building with cards, and choosing forecasted paths to prepare for growing threats.

name: A Perfect Day
summary: You are a perfectionist. You can't make anything if it's not perfect. So you get more and more anxious. One day, when you were so close to losing your mind, something perfect happened...

name: Apple Rabble Dazzle
summary: Harvest apples all year round! "Apple Rabble Dazzle" consists of short memory challenges with a boss battle at the end of each level. Play on your own or with friends!

name: Applecalypse
summary: Point and click about apples, featuring real photos as backgrounds, with gameplay sections inspired by billiards and a Lynchian story about a -paranormal?- event taking place in a small town, psychologically and physically transforming the neighborhood’s residents.

name: Aposis: Infinity Hero
summary: Aposis is a minimalist retro JRPG/Roguelike about fighting enemy androids while uncovering the truth about what happened to the world 3,000 years ago.

name: Apogee
summary: Apogee is a retro-style, physics-based arcade game where players navigate a lone spacecraft through an increasingly dense asteroid field.
